metadata.title: USN-6310-1 -- json-c vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that json-c incorrectly handled certain JSON files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6310-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libjson-c-dev - 0.15-3~ubuntu1.22.04.2 libjson-c-doc - 0.15-3~ubuntu1.22.04.2 libjson-c5 - 0.15-3~ubuntu1.22.04.2 No subscription required
